IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: To bring the full spectrum of musical theatre works to a wide and diverse audience.
IRS990.MissionDescription: To bring the full spectrum of musical theatre works to a wide and diverse audience.
IRS990.Description: The Skylight provided a season of two operas, three musicals, one musical revue and one sing-along.

Activity2.Description: The Skylight provided educational programming for adults as well as elementary, middle and high school students, predominantly in the Milwaukee public school system.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Part V, Line 4: Intended uses of the endowment fund.
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: Per the spending policy of the Investment Committee, the organization will use the proceeds from the endowment to support the mission and activities of the organization.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Each are provided via mail or e-mail upon request.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15b: Compensation Review and Approval Process for Officers and Key Employees
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Board and top management are well acquainted with the market value of similar positions of personnel in the industry.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Each board and committee member is required to fill out a questionnaire each year, disclosing any potential conflicts of interest. The questionnaires are reviewed by the Managing Director and Development Director and any potential issues would then be brought to the Board.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11: Form 990 Review Process
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The audit committee reviews the 990 (sent to them via PDF file) prior to submission.
